title: angelovangel/nxf-tgs pipeline
description: Process raw ONT data, generate html reports, and do assembly (plasmid, amplicon, bacterial genome)

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

fastq.description: Path to raw ONT fastq data (fastq_pass)

samplesheet.help_text: Samplesheet file must contain as a minimum columns 'user', 'sample', 'barcode' in any order. Other columns are allowed.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

pipeline.description: Which epi2me assembly pipeline to run
pipeline.help_text: Select which of the epi2me/wf assembly pipelines to run. One of wf-clone-validation (plasmid de novo), wf-amplicon, wf-bacterial-genomes

advanced_options.title: Advanced options
advanced_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
advanced_options.help_text: Additional options for the pipeline, usually not needed.

assembly_args.help_text: Additional command-line arguments passed to the assembly workflow. Pass these as strings '--param1 value --param2 value'...
